originalText.text: I really like my new hair Thank you Saori!  (not sure the designer‚Äôs name tho) I got a layered haircut for the first time and got a perm! For me, the salon is super affordable compared to their high quality services! Recommend to make an appointment before going there!

text.text: I really like my new hair Thank you Saori!  (not sure the designer‚Äôs name tho) I got a layered haircut for the first time and got a perm! For me, the salon is super affordable compared to their high quality services! Recommend to make an appointment before going there!

originalText.text:
I saw recommendations on social media and decided to try out Mingle soho. I booked with Sayuri in the beginning of august and arrived promptly during my appointment time.

She greeted me and was very nice. We started washing hair and it was very basic no thrill - 1 shampoo 1 conditioner, not the most gentle but gets the job done. I would say the wash was definitely below average and my shirt was wet, but I‚Äôm here for haircut so it‚Äôs okay if the wash isn‚Äôt the best.

I showed her pictures of style I have in mind - layers that start high, so it would give me some volume and frame my face nicely. She was hesitant to say yes/no but said she can fix my current layers. After a 10-15 min haircut, she decided to start blow drying and styling my hair, which originally caught me by surprised but my old stylist would perfect the cut after the hair is dry so I let her be. After that, she just removed the haircut apron and told me she was finished with her service (didn‚Äôt quite ask me if I wanted to fix anything) The appointment I had was 12-1 pm, but I was effectively out of the door (paid and everything by 12:36pm)

I came home and washed my hair the next day, and found out besides 2 inches shorter, my hair is really exactly opposite of what I asked for- dull and straight, somehow less volume than before and layers were super low and weighted my hair down even more. (See pictures)

Though she was nice and the price was reasonable (53 for haircut, and I tipped 25 on top of that), I will not recommend or return for their service

originalText.text: First time getting a haircut at Mingle Soho and I love my hair. I booked with Yuri and she paid so much attention to details. Will definitely come back again

text.text: First time getting a haircut at Mingle Soho and I love my hair. I booked with Yuri and she paid so much attention to details. Will definitely come back again

originalText.text: My favorite hair salon in NYC. I would recommend Hiromi for anyone who wants a trendy asian style.  She is so good at creating layers and giving you a perfect full shape for your calvaria.  She also recommends the best treatment for your hairs.  Once I made an appointment for Japanese straightening.  However, she recommended karetin, which damaged hairs less with a more nature look.  The result is exactly what I want - smooth but not too straight.  Hopefully it can last for 3 months. Overall super lovely experience with Hiromi.  Thank you so much for helping me maintain my hair styleüíïüíïüíï

text.text: My favorite hair salon in NYC. I would recommend Hiromi for anyone who wants a trendy asian style.  She is so good at creating layers and giving you a perfect full shape for your calvaria.  She also recommends the best treatment for your hairs.
